subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Receiver Terrell Owens agreed to a contract with the Cincinnati Bengals  on Tuesday and will report to training camp in a couple of days, according to his new teammate Chad Ochocinco and numerous news media reports.
snippet: Receiver Terrell Owens agreed to a contract with the Cincinnati Bengals  on Tuesday and will report to training camp in a couple of days, according to his new teammate Chad Ochocinco and numerous news media reports.
